Plot Utilities (fd_greens.utils.plot_utils)

plot_A(h5fnames: Sequence[str], suffixes: Sequence[str], labels: Optional[Sequence[str]] = None, annotations=typing.Optional[typing.Sequence[dict]], linestyles: Optional[Sequence[dict]] = None, figname: str = 'A', text: Optional[str] = None, n_curves: Optional[int] = None) → None[source]

Plots the spectral function.

Parameters

  • h5fnames – Names of the HDF5 files from which the curves are generated.

  • suffixes – Suffixes of the curves.

  • labels – Legend labels of the curves.

  • annotations – Annotation options to be passed into ax.text.

  • linestyles – The linestyles of the curves to be passed into ax.plot.

  • figname – The name of the figure to be saved.

  • text – Whether to add labels by legend, annotation or none.

  • n_curves – Number of curves.

plot_TrS(h5fnames: Sequence[str], suffixes: Sequence[str], labels: Optional[Sequence[str]] = None, annotations: Optional[Sequence[str]] = None, figname: str = 'TrS', linestyles: Optional[Sequence[dict]] = None, text: Optional[str] = None, n_curves: Optional[int] = None) → None[source]

Plots the trace of the self-energy.

Parameters

  • h5fnames – Names of the HDF5 files from which the curves are generated.

  • suffixes – Suffixes of the curves.

  • labels – Legend labels of the curves.

  • annotations – Annotation options to be passed into ax.text.

  • linestyles – The linestyles of the curves to be passed into ax.plot.

  • figname – The name of the figure to be saved.

  • text – Whether to add labels by legend, annotation or none.

  • n_curves – Number of curves.

plot_chi(h5fnames: Sequence[str], suffixes: Sequence[str], labels: Optional[Sequence[str]] = None, annotations: Optional[Sequence[str]] = None, figname: str = 'chi', circ_label: str = '00', linestyles: Optional[Sequence[dict]] = None, text: Optional[str] = None, n_curves: Optional[int] = None) → None[source]

Plots the charge-charge response function.

Parameters

  • h5fnames – Names of the HDF5 files from which the curves are generated.

  • suffixes – Suffixes of the curves.

  • labels – Legend labels of the curves.

  • annotations – Annotation options to be passed into ax.text.

  • linestyles – The linestyles of the curves to be passed into ax.plot.

  • figname – The name of the figure to be saved.

  • circ_label – The circuit label.

  • text – Whether to add labels by legend, annotation or none.

  • n_curves – Number of curves.

plot_counts(h5fname: str, counts_name: str, circ_label: str, tomo_label: str, width: float = 0.5) → None[source]

Plots the QASM and experimental bitstring counts.

Parameters

  • h5fname – The HDF5 file name.

  • counts_name – Name of the bitstring counts.

  • circ_label – The circuit label.

  • tomo_label – The tomography label.

  • width – The width of the bars in the bar chart.
